other_title: My Coffee Samurai: A Vending Machine Boyfriend
Watashi no Coffee Samurai - Jihanki-teki na Kareshi (Japanese)
わたしのコーヒー・サムライ 自販機的な彼氏 (Japanese)
plot: After being defeated in battle the ancient warrior, Jin, wishes to be reincarnated with a metal body and ends up being reincarnated as a coffee vending machine. He continues his battles with other warriors that also have been reincarnated as various things while discovering love with a modern day girl, Hemi.
